alert.note: Alert for Southern Baltimore (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 12 at 12:50AM EST until November 12 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...One half foot of inundation above ground level in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in Southern Baltimore County and the city of Baltimore. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EST early this morning, ongoing with the current high tide. * IMPACTS...Flooding is expected at the end of Thames Street in Baltimore. Water also is expected to cover the promenade at the dragon boat dock in the Inner Harbor. Minor flooding is also expected in the Bowley`s Quarters area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides two feet above normal. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. NW Branch Patapsco River at Baltimore MD MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 5.0 ft, Major 6.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 12/08 AM 2.4 0.7 1.5 1.0 None 12/09 PM 2.2 0.5 0.6 0.5 None 13/08 AM 0.7 -1.0 -0.1 1.0 None 13/10 PM 1.1 -0.6 -0.4 1.0 None 14/10 AM 0.7 -1.0 -0.2 0.5 None Chesapeake Bay at Bowleys Quarters MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 3.8 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.1 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 12/08 AM 2.4 0.7 1.7 1.0 None 12/09 PM 2.2 0.5 0.7 1.0 None 13/10 AM 0.5 -1.2 -0.3 1.0 None 13/11 PM 1.2 -0.5 -0.4 1.0 None 14/10 AM 0.5 -1.2 -0.3 0.5 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
